title: End of 2021: All of the Legal Updates You Need
description:
It’s the end of 2021 Judgies and we’re here to give you updates on all of the hottest legal topics we covered this year. From RHOSLC Jen Shah’s infamous arrest to Britney finally breaking free of her conservatorship, we got you covered. Tune in and see you in 2022!

Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/legallyjudgy
LinkTree: https://linktr.ee/legallyjudgy
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/legallyjudgy/?hl=en
Twitter: https://twitter.com/LegallyJudgy

Intro Song:
Trick or Treat (instrumental) by RYYZN https://soundcloud.com/ryyzn

Outro Song:

Free Download / Stream: https://bit.ly/-sundown-drive
